phrs.translation: 咖啡师, 咖啡调配师, 咖啡大师傅, 高级咖啡师

sentences.sentence: He has also spent serious time training his young staff of full-time baristas.
sentences.translation: 他还花大量时间培训年轻的全职咖啡师。

sentences.sentence: Great coffee, friendly baristas, and wonderful carrot cake. Wireless Internet.
sentences.translation: 这里还有香醇的咖啡、友好的服务生、美味的胡萝卜蛋糕和无线网络。

sentences.sentence: That meant the baristas were pouring millions of dollars of leftover milk down the drain.
sentences.translation: 这意味着咖啡师们会不断的将数百万美元的残存牛奶导入下水道中。
